listitem.para: Basic Qt initialization (not dependent on parameters or configuration)
Parse command-line options. We do this after qt in order to show an error if there are problems parsing these
Initialization of translations, so that intro dialog is in user's language
Now that settings and translations are available, ask user for data directory

inbodydescription.para: 6-7. Parse bitcoin.conf, determine network, switch to network specific options, and create datadir and settings.json.

detaileddescription.para: Create an unordered multi-line list of items.
